entities.name: tonks
entities.description: Tonks is mentioned as the one who wants to marry Lupin, despite his being bitten by Greyback. She is described as glaring at Lupin and shaking his robes.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is mentioned as the one Tonks wants to marry, who has been bitten by Greyback. He is described as looking tense and refusing to meet Tonks's eyes.

entities.name: greyback
entities.description: Greyback is mentioned as the one who bit Lupin.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as the one Tonks initially fell in love with, but it turns out she actually fell in love with Lupin.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as the one Tonks came running to find when she heard a rumour that someone had been attacked by Greyback.

entities.name: bill
entities.description: Bill is mentioned as Lupin's son who will not be a full werewolf.

relationships.description: Tonks has fallen in love with Lupin, despite his being bitten by Greyback.
Tonks initially fell in love with Sirius, but it turns out she actually fell in love with Lupin.
Tonks came running to find Dumbledore when she heard a rumour that someone had been attacked by Greyback.
